snippet: Vernon Wells is a constant presence at early batting practice, and perhaps that is what has brought about his recent resurgence.
lead_paragraph: Vernon Wells is a constant presence at early batting practice, and perhaps that is what has brought about his recent resurgence.

headline.main: Still Starting His Days Early, the Yankees’ Wells Reawakens His Bat
headline.print_headline: Still Starting His Days Early, the Yankees’ Wells Reawakens His Bat
